<h2 align="center"> Requirements ğŸ“ </h2>

- Pyrogram
- NodeJS [nodesource.com](https://nodesource.com/)
- Python 3.7 or higher
- [PyTgCalls](https://github.com/pytgcalls/pytgcalls)

<h2 align="center"> Commands ğŸ›  </h2>

- `/play <song name>` - play song you requested
- `/vplay <song name>` - play video song you requested
- `/stream <yt link>` - starts streaming live audio
- `/vstream <yt link>` - starts streaming live video
- `/ping` - Bot Online or Offine

<h4 align="center"> Admins Only ğŸ‘·â€â™‚ï¸ </h4>

- `/pause` - pause song play
- `/resume` - resume song play
- `/skip` - play next song
- `/end` - stop music play
